forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with mostly cloudy conditions overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 16F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine in the morning will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early with a wintry mix moving in in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A light mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then periods of snow expected late. Low around -5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A light mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then periods of snow expected late. Low 23F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady light snow later. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early will taper to a few snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then a few snow showers lingering overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%.
